title: Randeep Surjewala Shares an Old Picture From Nepal as ‘New India’
subtitle: Fact Check: A picture which shows a woman riding a bicycle while carrying a baby on her back and a sac on the back seat was shared by Congress leader, Randeep Surjewala, taking a jibe at the government.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, the link from where the picture was saved isn’t active anymore. Following this we conducted a reverse image search with relevant keywords.

We then came across a fact-check article by The Times of India, which mentioned that the picture was available on ‘European Pressphoto Agency’.

As per the details of the photograph available on the agency’s website, the picture was taken in 2012 in Kathmandu, Nepal. The description further mentions that it ‘shows a Nepalese mother carrying her child on her back as she travels on a bicycle towards Nepalgunj city’.
